column5: two Bangladeshi nationals came to the office of the Phnom Penh Municipal Police Office to request assistance to send them back home.------HOSSAIN MDEAR 25
column8: both entered the Kingdom of Cambodia on 13.01-2019 at the Phnom Penh International Airport (visas expired 13.02-2019).They were referred to the Department of Investigation and Implementation of the Directorate General of Immigration to carry out the proceedings.
